product_name: The North Face Base Camp Duffel - X-Small
long_description: Hauling adventure gear to the ends of the planet, the extra-small The North Face Base Camp duffel is just the right size to transport essential equipment. Main compartment features a D-shaped zippered opening for high visibility and easy access to the interior; internal mesh pockets offer extra organization. Duffel-style handles and twin haul handles on ends provide carrying options and can be used for towing or tying down when traveling. Alpine-style shoulder straps provide comfortable, easy hauling as a backpack. 4 side compression straps secure load and stabilize bag when traveling. Locking zippers protect your possesions (locks sold separately); ID pocket on top provides quick identification. Made of highly water- and abrasion-resistant TPE (thermoplastic elastomer) tarpaulin and ballistic nylon fabrics; ruggedly constructed with extra bartacks and double stitching.
short_description: Hauling adventure gear to the ends of the planet, the extra-small The North Face Base Camp duffel is just the right size to transport essential equipment.
